name: Floyd
description:
Released March 3rd, 2015.

A short game made using Ren'Py, to test out a character model created in Emofuri. This is actually my first time using the program; it's extremely short and has three endings!

It's probably going to lag quite a bit, Ren'Py is lacking in its' animation capabilities. This version will only work on Windows, but if you'd like it for Mac or Linux, just let me know!
